TString Struct Reference
[Class String container.]

A container for a string, includes corresponding functions to manipulate the string. More...

#include <kernel_string.h>


Data Fields

unsigned int NumberOfChars
unsigned int AllocatedChars
char * pChars

Detailed Description

A container for a string, includes corresponding functions to manipulate the string.

Note that no comparison function is given, the standard C functions strcmp can be used.

Definition at line 44 of file kernel_string.h.

Field Documentation

unsigned int TString::AllocatedChars
 

Parameters:
AllocatedChars  Internal use. Remembers the maximum allocated chars available in the pChars array.
